name: Trapped Dead
description: You and up to three friends fight to survive the Zombie outbreak in this game inspired by early '80s horror films!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® XP/Vista/7 Processor: 2.0GHz CPU  Memory: 1GB Hard Disk Space: 2GB  Video Card: Graphics card supporting shader 3.0 (onboard chipsets are not supported) DirectX®: 9.0c Sound: Sound card with DirectX 9.0c support

reviews.review_text: A surprisingly fun game. It deserves a lot of the criticism that it gets, but it's an unpolished dimond. If the makers had cared, it would have been one of the best games on the net. As it is, it's fun despite it's flaws. Just don't split up your party if you don't need to, since the micromanagement and lack of AI only rear their ugly heads if you're having to be in two places at once.

This game is actually quite nice. I bought 4-pack when it was on sale, and I haven't regretted. It is very hardcore game, for only pro gamers. If I would compare the difficulty to another game, it would be Dark Souls.   My friend Silun don't think it's very nice game, but it's because he dieded all the time, not giving game a chance.   If you are like me, and like hard, exciting, fascinating, realistic zombie survival games, this is a perfect game for you.
More of a puzzle game.
i recommend you watch a youtube video gameplay on this game before buying. Then after you've seen what i played. You'll not buy it :D
Fun but only if you are a true Zombie game fan.

This game is unfortunatly not a good one but really really not good, stupid broken game mechanics, combined with horrible difficulty level. Stay away at all cost from this garbage as you wont have much fun with it
This is ♥♥♥♥; avoid.
Fun mixed turn-based/real-time ARPG with zombies.  Awful voice overs, awkward camera controls, and buggy (crashes to desktop quite often), but still a fun game despite all those flaws.
It is not great but i enjoy it
Not the best, not the worst... I can live with this game. And have some fun.
A terrible game, really. Don't buy it.

Simply put. BAD *smacks the developers hands* BAD! Look what you did!   This is a HORRIBLE game full of bugs and bad mechanics. From randomly taking damage to characters who are not bleeding nor have zombies around them in any way shape or form to what can only be described as desyncing multiplayer. The multiplayer does NOT make up for this horrible game because you and your teammate will simply not be playing the same game. Doors they open will not open for you and vice versa which does not mean either of you are safe because you will simply be killed by zombies you dont see but your friend will. God I could go on and on about this horrible game but read the forums there isnt a single good review about this game even if it were heavily discounted.

Besides the game being good in general terms, it is still a lot of bugs, like the inventory dissappearing. Also, the game is poorly programmed and there is TONS of lagging and latency in the mouse (even if your PC is good).  Sorry guys but it needs great improovement (the mechanics are great and the story is good but the bugs ruin it).

Its a game that could've been good, had potential,probably a good start, and a great idea. It ruined however by stupid controls (if the developers had looked at the controls or played the game for 5 seconds it wouldve been obvious), which is my biggest problem. the game crashes a lot but eventually it gets going. but i just cant play a game where the controls just make it hard. im ok with hard games, ok games, and easy games. i like games with all different kinds of difficulties. i am not ok when a game is hard because the controls are just badly though out. not to mention the games buggy and pretty repetitive too...i didnt really see anything new happening. also i really hate that medkits simply stop bleeding instead of healing. its not the fact that i think the game NEEDS healing because if the controls werent so ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ horrid the game wouldnt be super hard. but i feel like the description was misleading for it...besides this long wall of text about medkits and controls that make me want to punch my laptop, the game is buggy and the gameplay gets repetitive (partially because of the controls...again srly) but it has potential. hopefully they decide to make inprovements. for now ive refunded the game because i just played a better game that i bought for less @_@
This is perhaps the worst zombie game i have ever played. Do not buy this, it is a waste of time and money.
This is the worst game I've played on steam. Let's try to keep it that way.
There might be a good game in here, but the control system and camera are dreadful. After ten minutes of wrestling with it, and never feeling I was in control of the game, I gave up.
Basically everything that could break does break

This game is pretty terrible. It feels like a 90's game that was given two weeks to bake betore shipping it out. Think Apogee.  Multiplayer is terrible. Effectively, it's the same maps as single player, but with no resource adjustments (more enemies however) and plot removed.  Avoid this game. It's a waste of your life.  0/5

This game to be honest was more of a disappointment than i thought from the trailer and pictures, the fighting style is slow and doesn't have that action/thrilling experience and i feel like i had wasted my money. I would not recommend this game to others but if future updates happen that change the style of combat then maybe you should check it out.
The gameplay is horrible.
broken game, multiplayer is a joke and unavailable

I don't know ~ I wanted to enjoy this game. However by the third level (prison) - I had killed roughly 60 zombies, - mostly with the baseball bat but I had such an issue controling my char during combat.  I decided I did not want to play anymore when I had wounded 2 zombies with a gun. Tried to equip my bat... my charactor threw it on the floor. Then I picked it up and equiped it. Clicked the zombie to hit it, but because of the messy door physics. My Charactor decided to spin in a circle, then swing. I yelled a profrantity, and decided I didn't want to play this game.  This is a top down, point and click style combat. Think Fallout 1-2 combat, but in real time instead of turn based. The controls and the camera make it feel difficult to control, open, fight, ect: I see what they were trying to do with the game and I get it, but I did not enjoy the controls.   To be fair - I did not play it mutiplayer.... I guess it is easier when you have 4 people with crappy controls.
The handicap guy got stuck in the toilet.

Good Lord, the game is trash. Despite all the negative reviews I was hoping it was still worth the $2 i spent on it. But NOPE, terrible! Not worth the install even if it was free. The multiplayer is terrible (two missions), its glitchy as hell and poorly coded. The devs are obviously amatures.

Good Lord, the game is trash. Despite all the negative reviews I was hoping it was still worth the $2 i spent on it. But NOPE, terrible! Not worth the install even if it was free. The multiplayer is terrible (two missions), its glitchy as hell and poorly coded. The devs are obviously amatures.

Fighting off zombies commandos style sounds fun, and it would be here if the game wasent rushed out the door so fast it forgot half its clothes, Trapped dead is buggy, poorly optimized, slow to respond to your controls and is just plain awful, the idea does not meet the execution and fails to meet our expectations because the game was basicly abandoned before it was finish, do not buy this game for 10 dollars, it is NOT WORTH THAT.
I can't say that in any way I recommend this game to anyone at any price.
Do not buy this game ever. 0 Dev support as of yet, on a game full of bugs and glitches that makes it unplayable. If they patch to fix, will be a nice game, besides that skip it.

This game is very much akin to a zombie, in that it is a broken, shambling mess. Mechanically, it's a joke. Buggier than Skyrim during a particularly hot summer, this title is likely not worth anybody's money.   When the game isn't lagging severely due to what can only be assumed to be an overall poor optimization, it's controls are equally unresponsive. When the controls do respond, it starts glitching out on the pathing. When the pathing doesn't have you running in circles, it will just decide to stop moving, at random. The ancient Warcraft RTS games were more functional by comparison.  Granting your Steam profile a few more levels through crafting five relatively cheap badges is likely the best part of this game. It certainly was for me. But I certainly wouldn't recommend buying it for that purpose. The multiplayer's dead, the game's unsupported, and it's basically a pile of crap which shows how not to get sucked into a zombie survival game for zombies alone.
It is ♥♥♥♥. ♥♥♥♥. I didnt enjoy any minute of this game.

it seems like an awesome game with a fun gameplay... but the reality is different the story is slow and predictable if you have played/seen zombie games/movies... the gameplay is really slow and buggy and I found myself most of the time struggling with the controls  I would recommend this game if it was on sale and if you were really bored in other situations I would ... NOT buy this game

When the game started it seemed like a nice zombie-themed jagged alliance-like game - but the sluggish character, those annoying minicutscenes and the ability to switch weapons in the time it takes a tombie to cross a highway are definite turn-offs -.-
Awful controls, awful gameplay, unskippable intro videos, obnoxiously loud, forces you to play through the awful story mode before you can play with friends. Complete waste of time and money.
The most wheelchair accessible apocalypse to date.
Terrible controls, after 3 minutes of some non friendly controls I had to shup it.
